Job Title: Walk-In Interview Drive | Relationship Manager - Branch Banking
Job Description:
Job description
Greetings from Kotak Mahindra Bank!

We at Kotak Mahindra Bank are looking for dynamic sales professionals for the following positions (On the payroll of Kotak Mahindra Bank)

1. Branch Relationship Manager - Branch Banking - Grade : M2 - Deputy Manager

2. Elite Relationship Manager - Branch Banking - Grade : M3 - Manager

3. Platinum Relationship Manager - Household- Grade : M4 - Senior Manager

Maximum Age Limit : 36 Years

KRAs:

Develops new and expands existing High Net worth Customer relationships for liabilities and commercial assets
Sources new bank customers through external individual efforts and acquisition channel
Ensures high levels of customer service orientation and application of bank policy.
Cross-sells bank products to existing set of branch customers, which are mapped
Informs customers of new products or product enhancements further to expand the banking relationship.
Plans and conducts special sales initiatives and events for prospective and existing clients.
Coordinates with other group companies to provide seamless access to other products.
Maintains complete relationship record for assigned customer accounts.
Tracks customer complaints/queries and turnaround times for customer satisfaction

Desired Candidate Profile:

Developing and maintaining banking relationships with a select group of high net worth customers through individualized customer service.
Very good understanding of Commercial Assets like CC, OD, TL, Export Finance
Understanding of Mutual Funds and Insurance is an added advantage
Customer orientation
High energy levels with a motive to succeed
Graduation qualification in any stream
3-7 Years of experience currently working in Relationship & Portfolio Management roles in Branch Banking can apply.


Walk In Interview Details :

Location of Placement : Chennai

Date : 3rd September 2024 - Tuesday

Time : 12:00PM to 3:00PM

Address : Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. No;40, Monteith Road, Egmore, Chennai 600008.

During the interview, you will have the chance to discuss your background, experiences, and aspirations with our hiring team.

Looking forward to meet You!

Team HR!
Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.

Job Title: International Voice Process Executive
Job Description:
Job description
Job description
In the role of Customer Experience Executive you would need to assist shareholders in buying & selling shares, in accordance with predetermined procedures & service standards under appropriate guidance and direction.

Role & responsibilities
Answer inbound calls, emails from Shareholders and assist them with their queries within the agreed service standards.
Answer inbound calls from Shareholders and assist them to buy or sell shares within the agreed service standards.
Respond to basic queries referring to senior colleagues where appropriate.
Contribute to the completion of the team's workload.
Improve own skills as knowledge within the operational team taking opportunities to identify area for improvement to processes and service.
Undertake duties at a similar level as required.
Ensure compliance with Equiniti's procedures, standards and reporting requirements, together with all relevant regulatory and statutory requirements, where appropriate implementing actions to protect our business at all times.
Always to undertake the duties of this role in accordance with the requirements of the company's Regulators.
Complete work within the security arrangements of Equiniti. Any deliberate contravention of these procedures may lead to disciplinary procedure.
Ensure that all work is undertaken within the quality system.
Ensure that work and ethics comply with all security arrangements both physical and information.

Preferred candidate profile
Excellent communication skills; Strong phone and verbal communication skills along with active listening
Proven experience in a customer support role
Meeting targets for accuracy, quality, volume and agreed service levels
Familiarity with CRM systems and practices
Basic understanding of data protection principles and knowledge in AML
Customer focus and adaptability to different personality types
Ability to multi-task, set priorities and manage time effectively
Adherence to procedures and regulations.
Demonstrate willingness to contribute to team beyond own immediate tasks

Perks and benefits
Being a permanent member of the team at EQ you will be rewarded by our company benefits, these are just a few of what is on offer:
31 days + 9 bank holidays (UK)
Comprehensive Medical & Life Assurance cover
Maternity leave of 6 months full pay, 10days paid paternity leave
Long Term Incentive Plan (LTIP) for all colleagues
Accidental & Life cover 2 times of concerned CTC

Shift Timings
US Night Shift

NOTE: Walk In Directly for interview (only). No calls / virtual connect

Contact Person
Visalakshi - 9940546962
Vinoth - 9940276473

Job Title: Redserv (Redington Group) | Walk in interview | 4th Sept'24
Job Description:
Job description
Dear Candidates,

Are you looking for opportunities ?

If yes, read below to know more about an opportunity in Redserv (Redington Group), one of the leading Supply Chain Management organizations!

We, at Redserv Global Solutions, are hosting a Walk-In Drive on 4th September 2024,11.00 AM - 2 PM.
Please find below the Interview details and Skills required:

1) Role hiring for: Accounting

Work Location : Perungalathur
Experience : 2- 6 Years
Mode : Work from Office

Qualification : CA Inter qualified/CA Final can only apply.
Skills required : General ledger/ R2R/Record to report

Roles & Responsibilities: -
Responsible for ensuring standalone Financial Statements and Consolidated Financial statements including Notes to Accounts is prepared on time and is in adherence to local/group accounting policies & applicable accounting standards.
Liaison with Auditors in planning the audit deliverables, ensuring completion of Quarterly/Annual/Synnex Audit before the board meeting, getting the Financial Statements signed on time.
Responsible for providing proactive/value added reports which will aid finance/business stakeholders to take informed decisions.
Responsible for doing Monthly Closure & Internal MIS to the Management & various internal stakeholders on time.
Responsible for reporting to the Parent on various reports including Financial Statements on a periodical basis.
Responsible for Control over Chart of Accounts.
Responsible for Reporting & Accounting.

2) Role hiring for: General ledger/ R2R

Work Location : Perungalathur
Experience : 4 - 8 Years
Mode : Work from Office

Qualification : M.Com/MBA Finance/ CA Inter qualified
Skills required : Team handling experience is must
Experience in Record to Report/General ledger

Job Responsibilities:-
Maintaining General Ledger and tracking all manual Journals recorded in the books.
Recognizing capital expenditure based on internal policy defined.
Ensuring proper classification of cost under profit & loss account.
Co-ordination with AP, AR, Inventory, Payroll, Treasury & Intercompany teams internally for getting information on time to meet timelines.
Responsible for calculating Depreciation, Amortization of costs, etc.
Creating provisions wherever required in the books.
Reviewing Intercompany transactions to ensure balances are agreed from both sides.
Preparation of Monthly MIS reports within the time frames defined.
Reconciliation of General Ledgers with respect to validity of the closing balances every month.
Co-ordination with Audit teams for providing information required.
Frequent co-ordination and communications with various countries to ensure all the transactions are properly considered & accounted for.
Maintaining good & smooth communication channels with members with in the team as well as with clients.
Maintaining high confidentiality of information to protect the interests of company and staff.

Eligibility Criteria :
Diploma candidates are not eligible to attend this interview.
Candidates who has arrears and does not have the graduation certificates cannot apply for this interview.

Location of the Walk-In Drive
1st Floor, Block B-6, Gateway Office Parks Private Ltd. SEZ.,
(Formerly Shriram Properties and Infrastructure Pvt.Ltd. SEZ.)
No.16, G.S.T Road, Perungalathur, Chennai 600 063

Date & Time: 04th September 2024 | 11.00 AM - 2 PM

Documents to Carry for the Interview
- Current updated Resume
- Please carry your last 3 months pay slips & your CTC break up (Fixed & variable components)
also have these documents in your email ID.
Feel free to share or refer about this drive with your friends, colleagues and references.

Location: Remote (Work from Home module)
Experience: 3-8 Years

Description
Design Cloud solutions from conceptual, logical, and physical design to meet clients business and technical requirements leveraging design patterns and appropriate AWS skills.
Ready to work 24\7 and in Rotational Shifts.
Demonstrate good expertise in all major Cloud Service Providers products and solutions.
Specialize in the best practice design, operations, and support of private/public/hybrid cloud infrastructure including Network, Storage, Compute and Security
Design Cloud solutions from conceptual, logical and physical design to meet clients business and technical requirements leveraging design patterns and appropriate AWS skills
Must have strong Infrastructure background into Compute, Networking, Virtualization and Storage Technologies.
Strong knowledge of cloud technologies like AWS, Azure, GCP.
Should have minimum 2 years hands-on experience in designing and implementing Cloud based solutions, Readiness Assessments and Migrating workloads to Cloud.

Must have good hands on experience in using enterprise class assessment toolsets.
Must have good hands on experience in cloud native and 3rd party migration tools
Experience in DR from on-premise to AWS/Azure cloud
Excellent knowledge on Linux/Windows.
Provide technical and non-technical guidance and support for junior operations team members.
Strong knowledge of infrastructure automation tools (Puppet, Chef, Ansible)
Nice to have Experience in configuring monitoring tools like Prometheus, graphene, and any other open-source tools.
Create and Managing S3 buckets, objects, and build JSON policies for security Monitoring with cloud native events, logs, and alerts. Security tools and skills
Experience on Automation and scripting. (Python, Boto3, pip3, awssdk, Azure PowerShell)
Practical expertise in performance tuning and optimization, bottleneck problems analysis
Experience in working in Managed service team.
Strong communication skills, with the ability to present complex information toTechnical Skills.
Minimum of 3+ years of experience in IT or consulting organization, of which at least 2-3years of experience designing and implementing cloud projects. Hands-on experience is a must.
Certified AWS /Azure Cloud Architect professional
Hands-on experience in leading implementation on Kubernetes, terraform, docker
Experience in Cloud Iaas, PaaS & SaaS
Work closely with cloud platform architects to deliver creative solutions to complex technology challenges and business requirements.

Job Title: WALK-IN For Freshers - Sales (Chennai)
Job Description:
Job description
About the Role:
Business Development Executives are a part of the Bank's front line sales team.
Their primary responsibility is sales of banks products to new customers for the bank.
They will be required to take part in offsite marketing activities and travel locally to meet new customers as a daily activity.
They are responsible for selling banking and third party products to customers based on their needs.
They are responsible for handling customer queries.
Business Development Executives are required to achieve targets assigned by the bank within initial 6 months for confirmation of their service
Key Responsibilities:
Selling of banks and third party products to new customers.
Conducting marketing activities and travel locally to meet new customers as a daily activity.
Contacting existing customers for more deposits and cross selling of more products.
Achieve sales targets as assigned by the organization on a daily and monthly basis.
Complete all mandatory certifications required for the role (AMFI, EUIN etc.).
Complete all learning activities conducted by the bank from time to time.
Daily entry of interaction with customers in banks CRM system.
Follow all compliance guidelines (regulatory & legislative) for each activity.
Participate and follow all initiatives that are undertaken by the bank from time to time
Qualifications:
Graduation from a recognized institute
Role Proficiencies:
For successful execution of the job, the candidate should possess the following:
Good communication (both verbal and written) skill in both English and the local language
Excellent lead generation and conversion skill
Ability to handle pressure and meet deadlines
Ability to work successfully as a part of a team
High sales orientation to meet the sales targets consistently
Ready to travel locally for meeting customers during sales calls.
Should have compatible mobile device with a required Android/ iOS version

#ComeAsYouAre 'We are dil se open. Women, LGBTQIA+ and PwD candidates of all ages are encouraged to apply'
